description.@en: Humans are extremely durable and their force of will unparalleled. When the chips are down, they manage to pull themselves up by the bootstraps.

effect.@en: Immediately after you suffer Damage from a melee or ranged weapon, spend a Fortune Point to ignore it entirely, therefore negating both Damage and any Injuries you may have suffered. You may even use this after failing to Dodge or Parry.
